reason: The code implements a legitimate training loop with standard PyTorch performance optimizations (torch.compile, CUDA stream prefetching, TF32/bf16 autocast, fused optimizer, GC suppression, flash SDP) — it does not hardcode outputs, truncate sequences, freeze layers, bypass real training, leak eval info, or return None for final_logits.
